description: This course examines the legal and policy principles governing the management of water resources in Australia and considers the principal legal and policy materials applied in the management of water resources in Queensland.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
